revision.comment: Omega moved page [[MYiR Z-turn Lite (Z7010)]] to [[MYIR Z-turn Lite (Z7010)]] without leaving a redirect: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=MYIR |model=Z-turn Lite |revision=(MYS-Z7010-L-C) V1.1 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=75 |est_release_date=08/2017 |type=development board, wired embedded board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Xilink |cpu1_model=Zynq XC7010;XCZ7010-1CLG400ABX2041; |cpu1_cspeed=667 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVEQ |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MTFC4GACAJCN-1M WT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J24 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ9031RN |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;5;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;1;,,, System Supervisory Voltage Reset w/ Watchdog;ON Semi;CAT823;;1;,,, SDIO Port Expander w/ Voltage Level Translation;TI;TXS02612;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;1;,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102;;1;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;TI;SN74LVC2G07;;4; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, FPGA, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.10; |stock_os=Linux;3.15.0-xilinx;Buildroot 2015.02; |default_user=root |default_pass= <!-- none --> |oui_eth=00:0A:35 }} {{TagLine|Z-turn Lite}} :[http://www.myirtech.com/list.asp?id=565 Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/20/myir-introduces-z-turn-lite-board-powered-by-xilinx-zynq-7007szynq-7010-soc-for-69-and-up/ ''MYiR Introduces Z-Turn Lite Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/compact-low-cost-sbc-runs-linux-on-zynq-7007s-armfpga-soc/ ''Low cost Cortex-A9 SBC offers GbE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Specification=== *CPU: ''Xilink'' Z-7010 Dual-core (ARM Cortex-A9) @667MHz :Artix-7 FPGA fabric w/ 28K logic cells, 17600 LUTs, 80 DSP slices *Storage: 16MB (QSPI) Flash, 4GB eMMC, Micro SD (TF) slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port *Power: 5V/2A
==Images== <gallery> File:Z-turn Lite Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Z-turn Lite Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
